name: Cute Statue of Rumia
uniques: All newly-trained [non-air] units [in this city] receive the [Eased-Mind] promotion
[+20]% Production when constructing [Land] units [in all cities]
quote: This statue is said to be so cute that you forget your problems just by admiring it.

name: Early Teaching Methods
quote: Rumia had been blessed by Keine-san with wisdom for her journey in leading the likes of her.
